Text:
thanks alot...but i do have a question about the other torrents like 9mm HD & ganster rio 
i know they are 2 mb files and they want you to download additional stuff 
my question is that do i need to root the phone or something 
because i updated my samsung galaxy s2 to ics and downloaded the ganster rio and all my media files wouldnt work properly (like videos would get stuck over and over and so would the music) im not sure if it was conflict in firmware or maybe the task manager force close i dont know

so again do i need to root the phone???
(for games like ganster rio and 9mm hd)

nope you dont need to root your phone im usin this game on my HTC ONE X without root-e
if this game dont work just click my username and get the game i uploaded (temple run brave)
i have a s2 on ics and 9mm hd works just fine so does the new max payne and mass effect....
worked fine on my ics s2 too but the rest of the stuff went alll screwy now im not blaming the game because i love .Bone and all his stuff runs on my phone i just wanted to make sure
thanks. Runs a bit slow on my htc desire z, though I guess that is just because my phone is starting to get old.
i have the Sony Xperia S and this game is runing fine but its on French
Thankx bone. Awesome work. This game works perfect on my htc one x
